short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redact social media posts that match word filters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redactor lets you black out posts on X, Reddit and Hacker News that match custom word filters. You can hover over redacted text to view it if you wish. To configure the word filters, go to the add-on's Options page. Words are case-sensitive and only match post text, not usernames.
